summary: CONSUMER TOOK VEHICLE TO DEALER ON 01/07/03 FOR RECALL REMEDY 96V099000.  ON 01/08/03 DEALER INFORMED CONSUMER THEY WOULD NOT PERFORM RECALL REMEDY UNLESS CONSUMER AGREED TO $1100 WORTH OF ADDITIONAL BRAKE WORK.  DEALER ADVISED THAT CONSUMER HAD FOREIGN MATTER IN BRAKE LINES.  CONSUMER THEN CONTACTED MANUFACTURER WHO SIDED WITH THE DEALERSHIP. TS  *DT
